analysis.description:
RefundEscrow.beneficiaryWithdraw (/unique_chucks/48/0x01ad3c7da8364d3f73d8ba6deb88c2add26a7837.sol#849-851) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _beneficiary.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/48/0x01ad3c7da8364d3f73d8ba6deb88c2add26a7837.sol#850)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/48/0x01ad3c7da8364d3f73d8ba6deb88c2add26a7837.sol#543-552) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/48/0x01ad3c7da8364d3f73d8ba6deb88c2add26a7837.sol#548-550)

TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (/unique_chucks/48/0x01ad3c7da8364d3f73d8ba6deb88c2add26a7837.sol#565-570) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (/unique_chucks/48/0x01ad3c7da8364d3f73d8ba6deb88c2add26a7837.sol#567-569)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/48/0x01ad3c7da8364d3f73d8ba6deb88c2add26a7837.sol#578-586) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (/unique_chucks/48/0x01ad3c7da8364d3f73d8ba6deb88c2add26a7837.sol#585-586)
